tables.description: Contains AWS cost and usage data for various services, regions, and accounts.

columns.name: AVAILABILITYZONE
columns.description: Availability zone where the resource is located.

columns.name: BILLEDCOST
columns.description: Total billed cost for the resource or service.

columns.name: BILLINGACCOUNTID
columns.description: Unique identifier of the AWS billing account.

columns.name: BILLINGACCOUNTNAME
columns.description: Name of the AWS billing account.

columns.name: BILLINGCURRENCY
columns.description: Currency used for billing.

columns.name: BILLINGPERIODEND
columns.description: End date of the billing period.

columns.name: BILLINGPERIODSTART
columns.description: Start date of the billing period.

columns.name: CHARGECATEGORY
columns.description: Type or category of the charge, such as usage or subscription.

columns.name: CHARGECLASS
columns.description: Class of charge or fee applied.

columns.name: CHARGEDESCRIPTION
columns.description: Description of the charge item.

columns.name: CHARGEFREQUENCY
columns.description: Frequency of the charge, such as hourly or monthly.

columns.name: CHARGEPERIODEND
columns.description: End date of the charge period.

columns.name: CHARGEPERIODSTART
columns.description: Start date of the charge period.

columns.name: COMMITMENTDISCOUNTCATEGORY
columns.description: Category of any applied commitment discount.

columns.name: COMMITMENTDISCOUNTID
columns.description: Unique ID of the applied commitment discount.

columns.name: COMMITMENTDISCOUNTNAME
columns.description: Name of the commitment discount program.

columns.name: COMMITMENTDISCOUNTSTATUS
columns.description: Status of the applied discount (active, expired, etc.).

columns.name: COMMITMENTDISCOUNTTYPE
columns.description: Type of commitment discount, such as Savings Plan or RI.

columns.name: CONSUMEDQUANTITY
columns.description: Quantity of resource units consumed.

columns.name: CONSUMEDUNIT
columns.description: Unit of measurement for consumption, e.g., GB or hours.

columns.name: CONTRACTEDCOST
columns.description: Cost as per the contracted price.

columns.name: CONTRACTEDUNITPRICE
columns.description: Unit price defined in the contract.

columns.name: EFFECTIVECOST
columns.description: Actual cost after applying discounts.

columns.name: INVOICEISSUERNAME
columns.description: Name of the entity issuing the invoice.

columns.name: LISTCOST
columns.description: List cost before discounts are applied.

columns.name: LISTUNITPRICE
columns.description: Standard unit price before discounts.

columns.name: PRICINGCATEGORY
columns.description: Category defining how pricing is applied.

columns.name: PRICINGQUANTITY
columns.description: Number of units priced.

columns.name: PRICINGUNIT
columns.description: Unit type used for pricing (e.g., hours, GB).

columns.name: PROVIDERNAME
columns.description: Cloud service provider name, e.g., AWS.

columns.name: PUBLISHERNAME
columns.description: Publisher providing the resource or service.

columns.name: REGIONID
columns.description: Unique region identifier.

columns.name: REGIONNAME
columns.description: Name of the AWS region.

columns.name: RESOURCEID
columns.description: Unique ID of the resource.

columns.name: RESOURCENAME
columns.description: Name of the resource being billed.

columns.name: RESOURCETYPE
columns.description: Type of the resource (e.g., EC2, S3, etc.).

columns.name: SERVICECATEGORY
columns.description: Category of AWS service (e.g., Compute, Storage).

columns.name: SERVICENAME
columns.description: Specific AWS service name (e.g., Amazon EC2).

columns.name: SKUID
columns.description: SKU identifier for pricing details.

columns.name: SKUPRICEID
columns.description: Unique price ID for the SKU.

columns.name: SUBACCOUNTID
columns.description: Sub-account ID within the billing account.

columns.name: SUBACCOUNTNAME
columns.description: Name of the sub-account.

columns.name: TAGS
columns.description: Tags or metadata associated with the resource.

columns.name: X_COSTCATEGORIES
columns.description: Cost category metadata.

columns.name: X_DISCOUNTS
columns.description: Discount details applied to the resource.

columns.name: X_OPERATION
columns.description: Operation type or API call associated with the charge.

columns.name: X_SERVICECODE
columns.description: AWS service code for identification.

columns.name: X_USAGETYPE
columns.description: Type of usage measured or billed.

tables.description: Contains Azure cost and usage details across subscriptions, services, and resource groups.

columns.name: AccountName
columns.description: Azure account name used for billing.

columns.name: AccountOwnerId
columns.description: Owner ID of the Azure account.

columns.name: AdditionalInfo
columns.description: Additional metadata or notes about the charge.

columns.name: BenefitId
columns.description: Unique ID of any applied benefit or offer.

columns.name: BenefitName
columns.description: Name of the Azure benefit (e.g., Reserved Instance).

columns.name: BillingCurrencyCode
columns.description: Currency in which the charge is billed.

columns.name: BillingPeriodEndDate
columns.description: End date of the billing period.

columns.name: BillingPeriodStartDate
columns.description: Start date of the billing period.

columns.name: ChargeType
columns.description: Type of charge, e.g., usage, purchase, refund.

columns.name: ConsumedService
columns.description: Azure service consumed for the charge (e.g., Compute, Storage).

columns.name: Cost
columns.description: Total cost associated with the resource or usage.

columns.name: CostCenter
columns.description: Associated cost center or department code.

columns.name: Date
columns.description: Date of the usage or charge record.

columns.name: EffectivePrice
columns.description: Effective unit price after discounts.

columns.name: Frequency
columns.description: Billing frequency, e.g., hourly, monthly.

columns.name: InvoiceId
columns.description: Unique ID of the invoice containing this charge.

columns.name: InvoiceSectionName
columns.description: Section of the invoice under which the charge appears.

columns.name: MeterCategory
columns.description: Category of the Azure meter, e.g., Virtual Machines, Storage.

columns.name: MeterId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the Azure meter.

columns.name: MeterName
columns.description: Name of the Azure meter measuring usage.

columns.name: MeterRegion
columns.description: Region where the resource usage occurred.

columns.name: MeterSubCategory
columns.description: Subcategory of the Azure meter.

columns.name: OfferId
columns.description: Offer ID or pricing plan identifier.

columns.name: PartNumber
columns.description: Unique part number assigned by Microsoft.

columns.name: PricingModel
columns.description: Pricing model type, e.g., pay-as-you-go, reserved.

columns.name: Product
columns.description: Product name associated with the charge.

columns.name: ProductOrderId
columns.description: Order ID associated with the product purchase.

columns.name: ProductOrderName
columns.description: Name of the product order.

columns.name: PublisherName
columns.description: Publisher of the Azure product or resource.

columns.name: PublisherType
columns.description: Type of publisher, e.g., Microsoft, Third Party.

columns.name: Quantity
columns.description: Quantity of units consumed.

columns.name: ReservationId
columns.description: ID of any associated reservation benefit.

columns.name: ReservationName
columns.description: Name of the reservation applied.

columns.name: ResourceGroup
columns.description: Name of the Azure resource group.

columns.name: ResourceLocation
columns.description: Location of the resource usage.

columns.name: ResourceName
columns.description: Name of the Azure resource.

columns.name: ResourceType
columns.description: Type of Azure resource (e.g., Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines).

columns.name: ServiceFamily
columns.description: Azure service family, e.g., Compute, Storage, Networking.

columns.name: ServiceName
columns.description: Specific Azure service name.

columns.name: SubscriptionId
columns.description: Azure subscription ID associated with the cost.

columns.name: SubscriptionName
columns.description: Name of the Azure subscription.

columns.name: Tags
columns.description: Resource tags providing additional metadata.

columns.name: UnitOfMeasure
columns.description: Unit used to measure usage, e.g., hours, GB.

columns.name: UnitPrice
columns.description: Unit price before discounts.

columns.name: UsageDate
columns.description: Date when the usage occurred.

columns.name: UsageQuantity
columns.description: Quantity of usage reported for the resource.
